select t.id, t.name, t.sex, t.age, t.phone, t.status, su_edit_user.nickname as edit_user, t.edit_date from sample_general t left join sys_user su_edit_user on su_edit_user.id = t.edit_user
${ew.sqlSegment}

select t.name, sd_sex.name as sex, t.age, t.phone, sd_status.name as status, t.address from sample_general t left join sys_dict sd_sex on sd_sex.code = t.sex and sd_sex.dict_type = 'sex' left join sys_dict sd_status on sd_status.code = t.status and sd_status.dict_type = 'commonStatus'
${ew.sqlSegment}
